content.title: Chelone glabra (White Turtlehead): Minnesota Wildflowers
content.excerpt: Photos and information about Minnesota flora - White Turtlehead: densely packed spike of creamy white 1-inch tubular flowers
content.textContent:
Plant Info
Also known as:
Genus:Chelone
Family:Plantaginaceae (Plantain)
Life cycle:perennial
Origin:native
Habitat:part shade, sun; wet meadows,  along shores,  wetlands
Bloom season:August - September
Plant height:2 to 4 feet
Wetland Indicator Status:GP: OBL
MW: OBL
NCNE: OBL
